name: Gyu Katsu
short_desc: Wagyu Steak Bites

name: Mong Kok Balls
short_desc: Curry Lobster Balls

name: Grassroots Sisg
short_desc: A true Kapangpangan sisig using pork mask and brain, onions, calamansi and chiles, served with quail eggs dusted with umami powder.

name: Pork Belly Skewers
short_desc: Grilled pork belly skewers with lemongrass relish, pickled carrots & onions.

name: Gambas
short_desc: Shrimps in garlic and extra virgin olive oil, and a side of grilled toast.

name: Mango Kani
short_desc:
Mixed fresh greens, kani, fresh mangoes, nori, carrots, red cabbage, 
sesame shoyu dressing. + add chicken.

name: Phoenix Mandarin
short_desc: Mixed fresh greens, toasted cashews, mandarin orange, creamy citrus dressing.

name: Tahina Tori
short_desc: Bell peppers, carrots, onions, apples, celery, pasta, red cabbage, peanuts, sesame seeds, chicken in black tahini dressing

name: Two Mushroom Soup
short_desc: Made to order, fresh Shiitaki and button mushrooms garlic, onions, cream and a side of grilled toast.

name: Oyako Soup
short_desc: Chicken Soup

name: Pasimpleh
short_desc: Garlic & anchovies in extra virgin olive oil.

name: Tritons Treat
short_desc: Shrimps, crab fat & sticks, capers, shrimp pesto, tomatoes, toast.

name: Pasta Puti
short_desc: Velvety cream sauce with mushrooms and bacon, side of grilled garlic-butter toast.

name: Penang Plato
short_desc: Soy & black pepper pork tenderloin stir-fry, coconut, and dried shrimp fried rice, cucumbers, and peanut sauce.

name: Salpicado
short_desc:
Pork tenderloin in butter, garlic, and ferment sauce with mushrooms

name: Gravy Crazy
short_desc: Pork tenderloin a-la-pobre on rice, mushroom gravy moat.

name: The Other Chosilog
short_desc: Homemade chorizo, garlic rice, fried eggs, sour cream.

name: Silog Special
short_desc:
The ubiquitous silog meal made special with pork tenderloin

name: Butterbutah
short_desc: Soy & butter pork tenderloin stir-fry, Japanese soy, egg, and mushroom fried rice.

name: Butayaki
short_desc: Teriyaki pork tenderloin stir-fry, shredded carrots, Japanese soy & egg fried rice.

name: Nonihm Thai
short_desc:
Soy & black pepper pork tenderloin stir-fry, Thai fried rice with 
green mangoes, shrimp paste, dried shrimps and scrambled eggs.

name: Saigon Adobo
short_desc: Lemongrass & garlic pork tenderloin stir-fry, garlic & shrimp fried rice, nuoc nam.

name: Bomb Chops
short_desc: Bone Marrow Buttered Chops

name: Kimchiwa
short_desc: Kimchi fried rice, bulgogi, bacon, fried eggs.

name: Sticky Char Siu Belly
short_desc:
Grilled five-spice pork belly with special char siu sauce, bok choy, 
with garlic & ginger fried rice.

name: Chikita Katsu
short_desc: Panko-crusted chicken breast fillet, homemade curry, tomato & basil fried rice.

name: Sakana Tempura
short_desc: Beer-battered fish fillet, kani, carrots and nori salad with spiced mango dressing, sesame shoyu sauce.

name: Bawang Bangus
short_desc: Fried garlic milkfish, garlic fried rice, fried eggs, grilled tomatoes, quick-pickled onions, spiced vinegar.

name: Ca Ban Tui
short_desc: Fish steamed in banana leaf with sambal tanglad, fried mushrooms and garlic and dried shrimp fried rice.

name: Bibimbap
short_desc: Beef Bulgogi, carrots, mushrooms, cucumbers, gochujang rice, fried eggs.

name: Dragon Chop
short_desc:
Grilled garlic pork chop, garlic yoghurt sauce, black sesame tahini,

name: TomKatsu
short_desc:
48-hour marinated thick-cut, bone-in, breaded and fried pork chop,
